attributes.additional_details: With the likely cancellation of schools, students will miss a large chunk of teacher-student revision time (and in some cases miss part of the curriculum). Going ahead with the exams will add to the stress and anxiety already felt by these students. Instead, they should be awarded their predicted grades which are given to them by teachers who know them better than any exam statistic could show.
attributes.background: Cancel the upcoming exams for Year 11 and Year 13 students in the summer, awarding them the predicted grades given to them by their schools

rejection.details:
The Government has closed all schools, colleges and universities, and exams have been cancelled.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
